revision.text:
{{Infobox comics creator | name = Fung Chin Pang
馮展鵬 | image = | imagesize = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = September 11, 1981 | birth_place = [[Hong Kong]] | death_date = | death_place = | nationality = | area = | alias = | signature = | notable works = ''Confidential Assassination Troop'' | awards = }} '''Fung Chin Pang''' ([[Chinese language|Chinese:]] 馮展鵬, born September 11, 1981) is a comic artist and illustrator from Hong Kong. His work include the [[manhua]] series ''Confidential Assassination Troop'', which is about the approach of World War Three and the communications war which proceeds it. It was first published by [[Tong Li Comics]] in 2003 and has been released in Hong Kong, Taiwan, Italy, France and Russia. He also done various illustrations for the novel series, Lie Sha Tian Chou Xiao Shuo (猎杀天雠). He is the illustrator for the PC game Soul Origin from Valhalla Entertainment. ==External links== * [http://www.cellar-fcp.com Official site] * [http://hk.myblog.yahoo.com/cellarzilch Official artbook blog site] * [http://cellar-fcp.deviantart.com/ Fung Chin Pang's deviantART site] * [http://tut-art.ru/obnazhyonnaya-zhenskaya-krasota-v-rabotax-kitajskogo-xudozhnika-fun-jinpan.html/ Fung Chin Pang on tut-art.ru] {{DEFAULTSORT:Fung, Chin Pang}} [[Category:Hong Kong comics artists]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:1981 births]] {{HK-bio-stub}} {{artist-stub}} {{Comics-artist-stub}} {{Manhua-stub}}
